short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension recommending the latest NFTs based on your interests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Non-Fungible Enthusiast is an innovative browser extension designed for NFT enthusiasts. It recommends the latest and most promising NFT artworks based on your public on-chain purchase records, helping you discover valuable treasures in the vast field of digital art. Whether you are an experienced collector or a novice investor, Non-Fungible Enthusiast is your best companion in exploring the NFT world.
